If you want to increase your Amazon KDP income in 2023 for low-content books, you have to target KDP Niches related to the holidays and events every month. In today’s video, I will make a quick summary of dates, holidays and profitable KDP niches in 2023 July to boost your Amazon KDP low content book sales! If you don't want to miss niche ideas for July, watch the video till the end.
